rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 17 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 2:15 AM, 27 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Cavite, Quezon and Batangas within the next 3 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bataan(Bagac, Morong) and Zambales(San Antonio, San Narciso) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
